I don't recommend this game. Only buy it at sales if you have friends to play with. The game is missing several necessary fixes and quality of life features. 

You have to reinvite all your friends each round, but not only that, after a round it places you into a lobby, where you have to go back to the menu, select play with friends and reinvite everyone one by one.

Want to play as a survivor? Don't bother, before getting to level 30 your survivor is completely useless. It can be useless after level 30 if you weren't lucky enough to get all the perks that can help you. Imagine this. You have less than 10% to escape from a hook, and if you do manage to get off the killer get notified, pretty much seconds after you get off he is on your trail because most killers start with a perk that can track you by your whimpers, blood or just simply see you through obstacles if you are injured.

Want to play as a killer? Prepare to be hated, low rated and abused. People will block your steam profile, because there is no other ways implemented to never get to play with the same player again. If you ok with that you son of a b* then enjoy the infinite amount of XP by camping hooked players or just collecting them when they are in dying status next to a hooked person so you can keep eye on both. Easy game easy life.

There are killers that are straight up invisible, or have terror radius so small that you only notice them when they stick a knife up your ass.

I only enjoy this game for a few rounds with friends. I got it on a good sale, so no regrets, but I heavily recommend to play something else.

I think this game is good and that you should buy it, if it is on sale and you want this game buy it then, if not it is your decision but this game is worth it even tho "The Wraith" still has not got his fixes yet it is still a fun game and since "The Nightmare" has got his nerfs dont expect that many Nightmares anymore. EDIT: Since i have played this game for 300+ hours now i can now give a good review.  People here complain about how this game is survivor sided and i agree with it. This game tried to get a fix with the Emblem System but all that did was push the killer pip more to survivor (that means that survivor now has more control over the killer) and the killer can not make the depip since the survivors hold the power.  This game is supposed to be an assymetrical survival multiplayer horror game where 4 weak survivors go against 1 strong killer. At the current state of the game the survivors are more powerful than the killer is.  I dont want people to get discourged by this and i hope people go out and buy this game and play it

Which company lets an ONLINE, MULTIPLAYER GAME, save its data to the players own computer? These douchebags.
I haven't been able to play since my upgrade to win10.
Most of my time in game, has been starting it up to see if I can play it. 

After countless mails to support, reinstalls and wipes of harddrives, I've given up. Their support is THE WORST I've ever dealt with. The company is a JOKE. 

If you plan on reinstalling your computer after getting this game, don't bother, you won't be able to play it again.

I sincerely hope that Behaviour Digital Inc. goes to the grave.

**Edit: My problem has since been resolved, and I can actually play the game. But my review will stay the same no matter what. :)
and the "compensation" for almost a year of trouble was barely enough to prestige one character. :))))))))

[code] Como o jogo funciona? [/code]
Bom... São 5 jogadores no total, 4 jogadores jogam como os sobreviventes que tem o objetivo de fazer os 5 geradores que se encontram no mapa e fugir do 5 jogador que  joga com o assassino que tem o objetivo de matar todos os 4 jogadores e assim não deixar eles fugirem.
[code] Minha opnião: [/code] 
O jogo é um jogo de "terror" realmente é um jogo de terror, você toma varios sustos jogando mas não é só um jogo de terror em alguns momentos o jogo chega até ser engraçado, bom eu me diverti muito jogando e recomendo muito esse jogo. sz

Идешь такой ты ночью,
Видишь ты заброшку
Видишь мяукающую кошку
И продолжил свою дорожку.

Решил позвонить друзьям
А друзья то не плохие
И пошли за тобой по пятам,
Да они и не малые..

Зашли вы в ворота...
И пошли гулять вы по заброшке....
А маньяк думает- О да....
И уже не слышно той мяукающей кошки.

Вы разделились,
А зря.
И можно сказать что вы самоубились..
Лучше бы не наступало этого дня.

Он охотится за вами
Вы даже этого не знали..
Вы для него как твари..
Потому что с ним не как надо поступали...

Ну вот настал тот час.
Слышишь крики....
И покинул этот мир один из вас
А орал он словно психи...

Ну вот заведен первый геник
Но нету все равно одного из вас...
И ты метаешься словно веник..
Потому что настал тот час....

А он не спит ищет вас....
А вы в надежде убежать...
И провомолвил один из вас- ВОТ ЖЕ ГОНДУРАС!!!
Да и некому вас спасать....

Вот прошло еще немного время
Все твои друзья легли....
И взошло то истенное семя
Когда мы сбежать могли

Но сбежишь теперь ты один
Ты прыгнул в люк
Тем самым расстался с ним...
И запомнишь навсегда тот убийственный крюк...

Ich stimme anderen zu, was die geteilte Meinung über das Spiel angeht, da hier allerdings nur ja/nein verfügbar ist nehme ich dennoch ja, da es mir auch nach all der Probleme immer noch irgendwie Spaß macht. 
Ich schildere jetzt die Spielprobleme, die bei mir in meiner Zeit aufgetreten sind.


DC's und Onlineranking:
Ich habe gestern entspannt spielen wollen und es gab wohl massige Serverprobleme. Hatte mit den Pips Rang 16 erreicht und hart dafür gearbeitet. Jetzt bin ich auf Rang 18, weil es sehr schwer war ein gutes Match zu finden bis ich dann das Spiel geschlossen habe. 
Das erste Match war super laggy und es war reines Glück, dass ich gewonnen habe, da ich vor Lags nicht sah wo ich überhaupt war, danach ging es bergab - ein Match wurde komplett gecrasht und ich bin auf Rang 17 ohne Pips gefallen, das danach hatte zwei DC's von Überlebenden, während die andere Person schon tot war und ich an den Haken kam. Insgesamt liebe ich das Spiel, aber es ist frustrierend, wenn ich dauernd meinen Rank verliere, denn es ist schon mal vorgekommen.

DLC's und OP-Killer bzw. Spielerverhalten:
Leider, und das wurde oft bemerkt, gibt es mittlerweile viele Killer/Überlebende und dann auch noch die richtig guten nur als DLC zu kaufen. Bei denen, die Lizenzrechte brauchen verstehe ich es, da diese auch kosten und man irgendwo wieder einholen muss und wenn mir ein Killer besonders zusagt, dann kaufe ich ihn auch (selbst wenn es im Sale sein sollte).
Ich besitze also selbst drei der DLC's, einfach, weil ich sie aus Nostalgie besitzen wollte.
Ich spiele allerdings maintechnisch Survivor und nicht Killer, da das meine "Rolle" ist, die mir den Kick verschafft.. nur leider verschafft es mir aktuell eher Frust und Gereiztheit.

Einige der neuen Killer sind leider sehr overpowered - Freddy, der Doctor, Leatherface, die Jägerin - und es ist nur als gutes Team möglich, da lebend rauszukommen, insbesondere, wenn der Killer weiß was er macht.
Freddy ist ein Killer, gegen den es genauso viel Spaß machen kann, aber genauso gut einfach ätzend sein kann, da er, wenn er dich in seiner Traumwelt hat, restlos deine Aura sieht bis du aufwachst.. und so schnell geht das nicht, dass der nicht zu dir rüberlaufen könnte, außer, wenn du extremes Glück hast.
Gleiches gilt für den Doctor, der, wenn er andere im Wahnsinn hat und sei es nur Stufe 1, schnell weiß, wo man ist.. 
Die Jägerin ist davon noch am harmslosesten, taucht aber in vielen Matches auf und ist durch ihre Distanzwürfe besonders gefährlich, was durch Perks und Add-On noch verstärkt werden kann.
Es ist also recht frustrierend gegen diese Killer zu spielen und sie brauchen dringend eine Regulierung.

Außerdem ist mir nicht klar, wieso Camping als Spielstrategie gelten darf, denn es ist für einen ohnehin starken Killer eine Versicherung, dass die Überlebenden einander nicht retten können und ich finde es sehr unnötig, wenn ein Killer straight facecamping betreibt anstatt faire Chancen zu gewähren.
Manche mögen mir da widersprechen, aber ich selbst verliere direkt den Spaß am Spiel, wenn ich das Camping bemerke - sei es, weil ich am Haken hänge und der Typ mir in der Lunze hängt oder weil ich meine Teammates nicht retten kann, was mich als hilfsbereiter Spieler, der gerne alle raus haben will, auch echt annervt.

Hilfsbereit ist auch das letzte, was ich ansprechen möchte: Spielerverhalten der Survivor.
In letzter Zeit häuft sich, dass Überlebende den Killer mocken und triezen, teabaggen und pallett looping machen und das Spiel nicht mit dem dafür geforderten Ernst nehmen, sondern einfach herumalbern bis Killer quitten, weil sie darauf verständlicherweise keine Lust haben.
Auch ist mir zunehmend passiert, dass meine Teamkollegen nicht gerade von der, sagen wir, netten Natur waren und eher egoistisch gewartet haben bis ein anderer oder ich starb, um selbst die eigene Haut zu retten, wo ich selbst verletzt noch zu dem Angehakten laufe und versuche, denjenigen da raus zu holen (weil es sich so gehört, es ist ein Teamspiel).
Ich warte immer an der Tür, ob alle in Sicherheit sind bis ich sie verlasse, außer ich werde vom Killer dazu gezwungen und muss gehen.

Dennoch muss ich abschließend sagen, dass trotz der aktuellen Kritikpunkte, das Spiel für mich ansprechend und spaßig ist, nur eben in deutlich weniger Runden als ursprünglich, da sich das Gegenverhalten aller leider verschlechtert hat.
Mit guten Teammates und einem fairen Killer ist es aber ein aufregendes und spannendes Spiel und ich genieße es und freue mich über Siege oder nehme - bei fairem Verhalten - auch Niederlagen lächelnd in Kauf.
Das Leveling im Blutnetz macht Spaß und ich bin immer neugierig, welche Perks und Items mir verfügbar gemacht werden.
Wenn man dicke Nerven hat und Freude an einem Spiel dieses Konzeptes hat, dann empfehle ich es, aber für die, die mit den aktuellen Problemen und Unbalancing nicht umgehen können ist es leider nichts.
Im Endeffekt muss es jeder selbst ein paar Runden ausprobieren, ob es einem wirklich zusagt oder nicht.

I'm a huge Horror movie fan and just recently bought the game. This game definitely gets your blood pumping and does not disappoint! You definitely need to get your reaction time down for the QTE's, to help get the generators up and running. Did you have a hard day at work??? No worries! Just log in as a Killer and take it out on some survivors. Stress Therapy...Check! But seriously, it is a very fun game!

我从今年9月份开学入手了这款游戏，首先是暑假看到朋友正在玩，渐渐的我也迷上了这款游戏，开始的第一天夜里，也是最痛苦的一天夜里，那时候都不懂得怎样才能跑起来。。。看到了发电机，然后打不住QTE，爆米花从开始爆到结束，当然，电机没有修好，并且引来了小屠屠，然后不出意外的树上看世界。杀机中的第一场游戏大半时间在树上度过。接下来的几把，被兔姐姐的摇篮曲，护士姐姐的嚎叫，电锯的锯子声音以及李奶奶突然从地下钻出来而吓个半死，到后来也接触过小屠屠，结果明显，开局砍一刀，大门就开了。如今，也玩了300多个小时了，虽然仍是人屠双菜，但是还是会有进步的空间的，因为自身的原因，PVE游戏中的情绪不能控制，让我愈发地对这个游戏充满了期待，至少被抓不会脾气爆发，还会觉得充满乐趣。虽然游戏中的种种BUG以及匹配机制还是存在不足，但是我仍然喜欢这款游戏，也在游戏中认识了很多伙伴，并不孤单。我只想对萌新来说，游戏值得入坑，虽然前期你会遇到各种***，hhh。

I primarily play as killer. I love this game -- the concept of it, that is. However, the latest updates, nerfs, and especially DLC nerfs (looking at you, Nightmare and Cannibal) unfairly favoring the survivors is beyond frustrating. This games balance is broken. Even if I try my hardest and do the best that I can, none of my skill will out-perform the nerfs on killers and the overpowered perks of the survivors.

Fix this ****, devs. FIX IT.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

EDIT:

8/26/2018 -- So far the game has gone through multiple revisions. Sadly, the game developers have struggled to keep a good balance between the killers and survivors, the game balance swaying from side to side. I can hoenastly say that the game seems to be a lot more balanced than it has been in the past, but it still has a long way to go. I have switched my review from a negative to a positive, in hopes that this balance will continue.

7/20/2022 -- As of the latest rework, the game seems far more balanced. My time in this game as of now is 50/50 between survivor and killer, and I can honestly say that both roles feel much better as a whole. The UI rework is refreshing, the perk reworks were done (mostly) well, except for unnecessary reworks such as Iron Will. Dead hard is harder to use, but actually feels rewarding to use right, instead of getting a free bolt to the nearest obstacle. The added 10 seconds to generators feels nice, lengthening the round a bit (in higher ranks the games go by way too fast in my opinion). As killer, the faster pallet and vaulting feels fluid. I'm not steamrolling survivor teams constantly (or anymore than I did before the rework, anyway). I've come across more endurance saves, but nothing crazy, and regardless, I enjoy having to work for my kill anyway. The bloodweb grind is finally a little less, well, grindy, and having perks of prestiged characters was much needed. I wish having prestige characters before the update gave you more of an award besides a perk charm, but I guess beggars can't be choosers. Overall, the rework seems to have been a positive one, and I can honestly say that I'm having more fun with Dead by Daylight than I ever did in the past.

This isn't to say that the community is as toxic as ever with camping/tunneling killers and bully squad survivors, both of which make me want to tear my hair out, crawl up the wall, and screech at the chandelier, but it's certainly a start lol

[OLD REVIEW FROM: 12 Nov. 2017]
Basicly a good game... if you could be able to play it.
Thanks to the BUG "Patches" it got really hard to even 
create a lobby without causing the game to crash.
It takes you around 10 to 20 tries to get in a working lobby
and than you gotta hope that it doesn't take too long for
other survivors to join your lobby because otherwise the killer
is looking for a new one and you are back at where you started.

[NEW COMPLAIN FROM: 24 Sep. 2021]
After returning to DBD i feel like this game has turned into a pay2win. 
Basic killers are to weak compared to the ones locked behind a paywall.
Most of the buyable killers only have one or no counters at all, depending on the map you're playing. Not knowing the killer before starting the game is a good thing but against overpowered killers like the Doc for example you can't even build your perks against him.
While killers have the chance to go into the match with an insane perk build you are pretty frigged up as a survivor since you can only make a general perk build and hope for the best.

Overall the game is pretty decent and i feel like there were a lot of improvements especially when it comes to loading time and performance but i also think it got way more unbalanced and is not as fun as it was when it came out. I mean new characters are cool and all also having to pay for them is fine (somehow they gotta make their money back for buying the licenses i guess) but some of them could really use a big nerf to bring back balance, fun and peace ... Also dead survivors! But only dead survivors is kinda meh.

One last note: Dear killers, please stop camping at the hook, thats just a small pp move!

Great game! Even better with your friends.

If you're planning on playing alone, though, don't buy the game for the full 20 euros, but wait for some sort of sale. If you DO plan on playing with friends, the game is worth the 20.

Эта игра - один сплошной баг! Играю в нее уже год и каждый раз с нетерпением жду обновления в надежде, что исправят вылеты и пофиксят известные баги! Чтобы сыграть с друзьями в команде, запаситесь терпением, потому что игра будет либо вылетать в главное меню, либо просто не будет находить противника. Чтобы сыграть пару игр, приходится долго перезаходить и ждать бесконечное количество минут. К балансу игры отдельные претензии. Если появляется новый маньяк, то будьте уверены, что играть первый месяц будет невозможно и совершенно не интересно, т.к. этот маньяк будет на столько имбовый, что я частеньку думаю удалить эту игру. Хорошая идея, интересно играть, но на столько сырая игра, что  хочется настучать разработчикам по башке!
Divertido multiplayer!

A game where I can play as a survivor, fleeing from an epic killer? Or I can become the monster and slay them all? 

[b]Amazing![/b] At the first look....

I am really into horror-movies. I love old and new slasher-movies. I didn't recognize this game until end of 2016. I bought it and instantly fell in love with this game. I spent already 2000+ hours of my life with it. So let's talk about it.

Gameplay:
As survivor you have to repair generators to get the exit doors working. There are four survivors versus one killer. The killer walks a bit faster than the survivors. If he has hit you the second time you go down on the ground. If you go down he can hang you on a hook and you die at the third time hooked. Might?

Other survivors can heal you after the first slash. The killer shouldn't be too near actually.
They can take you off the hooks. They can sabotage the hooks. They CAN. A lot of people don't do anything. They do a generator, flee from the killer to the other side of the map and let you hang on the hook. At the first chance, they open the exit and get out. Best excuse I got so far: "I am not meant to help you... Help yourself."
Sometimes people heal you while the killer is approaching. You can't move at that moment and they just release you shortly before the killer hits you. Only by a trick you can escape (press 1 or 2 to show with your character).

Sometimes the survivors die one by one and you are the last. If there are already two generators repaired, you can find a hatch and escape, without doing the last generators alone and opening the exit doors. Sadly a lot of killers just camp or even facecamp (i.e. they stand directly before your hook), so noone can rescue you. 
What, in my eyes, destroys the whole game-idea. Some killers seem to be afraid to lose rank and don't get enough points. Maybe it gets them a hard one. These players always say "It's not forbidden!". Right, but it's a difference of being an idiot that ruins the game and someone who wants to have fun.

Another problem are people which leave the match. As survivor you have to do their job now too and are even more in danger.
As killer: If a survivor leaves, you get a small amount of points as a compensation. Which is in my eyes not enough. After three years a time penalty is invented. Finally...

Technical:
Graphics are not pretty or something special. The fleeing survivor has no time for beautiful landscapes. Amazing graphics wouldn't fit in this type of game anyways.

So you should expect that the game runs fluent and without problems? Sometimes you will have lags, like in any other game. Some people are so laggy, that it affects you in a horrible way. While fleeing from the killer you run against walls and trees, get stuck at invisible edges of the floor. So you get easily hit or caught by the killer. But you can see the pings of the other players in the lobby before the match. Too high ping for you? Just leave the lobby and search for another match.

Cheats.
As survivor: killers without a single perk can carry you around the whole map while you can't get off them. 
As killer: some people seem to lag, but don't hit a tree or a stone or a wall. You just can't hit them. Some are warping forward, that it's fun to watch. I played one day as The Hilbilly, chose my chainsaw-run and they FLED! In a direct line! They were faster than me with the chainsaw! I was curious what perks they had. They had: NONE!

Also the developers come up regularly with interesting ideas. Like change the pip-system for killers. Now you LOSE a pip while having killed actually only two survivors and having 18000 points after the match. Why? Because one of the survivors left the game while dying. A nice idea for killers trying to rank up, hm?
Also you can get 17000 points for the match, kill two survivors and get a loss of pip there. Huge fun! Oh wait, sometimes you do the exact same thing as in the round before. You only get 13000 points, but get a pip. You can't be serious, developers?

And let's not forget the dailies. You have to survive two times with Laurie Strode? You escaped through the exit door, and the killer hasn't even seen you. Success? NOPE. No bloodpoints for you! Kill a survivor with the Hillbilly with it's own hands? I did a Momentum Mori of four. And did not get the points.

A word on community: often toxic, most time malicious.

Let's just take a look at the broken mechanics. Like pallets. If you as survivor run through the gap and pull down the pallet, it happens that you stand on the side you have been before. On the killers side! He sure easily hits you then. Even better is, you want to pull down the pallet and just nothing happens... Killer gets you. Amazing!

If you're playing as killer and have someone on your shoulder and run through the pallet-gap, other survivors can pull down the pallet and you drop the survivor. Amazingly the survivor might now stand IN the pallet.
Once I had a situation I was blinded then, the last generator was made and by that the stuck survivor was healed, while I destroyed the pallet. He fled. Another survivor already opened the nearest gate so he was able to flee without a scratch. THAT are the moments I hate this game.

And now my personal technical disasters. 
One day a patch came in, I updated and wasn't able to play anymore. No matches were found anymore, lobby instantly closed when I tried to open. So a restart might help? I wasn't even able to start the game then anymore. Did the help came from the developers? No. Two months without playing I saw a new solution in a community discussion. And the game started again. Thank you, tech support.

Let's come to the [b]BEST[/b]. One day I experienced the "zero bloodpoints bug". What is that and how it happened? First you have to know: savefiles were (then) on YOUR Pc. Not in the cloud. By a strange game-behaviour my savefiles were corrupted or deleted. It is a known problem since some time.
All my bloodpoints, the ingame-"money" to level up, were lost and all my survivors and killer were reset to level 1. So I submitted a support-ticket. Result: [b]FOUR WEEKS NO REACTION[/b] of the support team. So I wrote another Email. I told the support I expect an answer within a week.
Result:[b]NOTHING![/b]
TWO MONTHS no reaction on my ticket.Long waiting times? That's an excuse for lazyness.
After a year the bug was finally fixed.
Interesting, it's a running-gag when some of the devs said: "[b]I think we did a pretty good job so far.[/b]"

Story:
No story (only if you call the written "background" to each person as a story). Just multiplayer.

Conclusion:
This game needs several fixing, but can be played IF you get the right players and not unfair and / or retard3d f\/cks. 

[b]I can't recommend the game anymore.[/b]
Its a solid game
